home.message-1: Welcome to the site dedicated to B.note. On this site, you will find useful resources for B.note, as well as a preference management interface.

download.title: Download B.note
download.message-1: Since version 3.0.0 of B.note, the source code is free and available on GitHub. Download the image below
download.message2: The official version of B.note is available on the Eurobraille website. You can download it from the site.
download.message3: I provide another version whose source code is available Here. You can download it below

footer.message1: This web application is free of rights. The source code is fully reusable and editable
